title: Can't access account even after changing password multiple times.
body: I have access to the email that is linked to the account, and I have gone through the process of resetting the password and received the confirmation that the password was successfully changed. This is in regards to a LAN account. I cannot login to the website or the client with only this account. Thanks for any help.

replies.body: Without knowing what account you're trying to access, it's a little hard to try and figure out what might be going on. Double check that you're trying to log into the LAN region on the client, but if it's still not working hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Ok, I didn't know if there was a general fix or something. I've already submitted a ticket but it's been a while, and I was hoping to play some games tonight. Thanks for the response though.
